00042 // Here you have to define your control coefficients
00043 
00045 #define Kp_speed 30
00047 #define Ki_speed 30
00049 #define Kd_speed 0
00050 
00052 #define Kp_cur 1
00054 #define Ki_cur 3
00056 #define Kd_cur 0
00057 
00058 
00059 // All PID coef are multiplied by 2^Kmul
00060 // For exemple : kp = 1 => Kp = 1 * 2^K_scal = 1 * 2^4 = 16
00061 // To get the right result you have to divide the number by 2^K_scal
00062 // So execute a K_scal right shift
00064 #define K_speed_scal 4
00066 #define K_cur_scal 4
00067 
00068 // Speed measurement
00069 // K_SPEED = (60 * 255)/(n * t_timer0 * speed_max(rpm))
00070 // with n : number of pairs of poles.
00071 // and t_timer0 : 16us
00072 #define K_SPEED 34152 // max speed : 7000 (MC100 motor)
00073 //#define K_SPEED 11250 // max speed : 17000 (MMT 35-1LS motor)
00074 // if you want to calculate the absolute speed
00075 //   absolute_speed = alpha * measured_speed
00076 //   with alpha = 60 / (n * K_SPEED * t_timer0)
00077 
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 /* IMAX for DAC is calculated on that way :
00081    Rshunt = 0.05 Ohm
00082    Vref = 2.56V
00083    DAC is left adjust so it is like a 8 bit DAC
00084    IMAX = imax(amp) * 0.05 * 5 * 256 / 2.56 + 128
00085    IMAX = imax * 25 + 128
00086    The result must be less than 254              */
00087 
00088 //#define IMAX (4 * 25 + 128) /* 4 amps */
00089 #define IMAX 228
